analyzed: purāṇa pulinam hitvā  suddha pulinam ākiri
translated: Having given up the old grass,🔽I made a pure grass offering.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the grass offering.
I was a king, a lord of the people;
With the name of Mahā Pūla,
and the eight liberations as well;
the Buddha’s instruction was accomplished.”🔽Thus the venerable Pūla Pūjāka recited these verses.
